/*---:[ ie6.css for the Copyblogger theme ]:---*/
#content, #sidebar { overflow: hidden; }

#if($where == "category")

Entries categorized '$category.Name' ↓

#elseif($where == "tag")

Entries tagged '$tag' ↓

#elseif($where == "search")

Search Results for '$macros.SearchQuery' ↓

#end #foreach($post in $posts)

$post.Title

$post.Published.ToString("dddd, MMMM dd yyyy") - $macros.CategoryLink($post.Category)

$post.Excerpt("

", "

" ,"Continue reading →", 300)

$macros.CommentUrl($post, "%{anchor='comment_list'}")

#nodata
Sorry, there are no posts matching your request.
#end #if($where == "category" || $where=="home") $macros.Pager("navigation") #end

$macros.Style("style.css","screen") $macros.Head()
$data.Site.Title #if($where == "home")

$data.Site.TagLine

#else

$data.Site.TagLine

#end
    $macros.NavBar()
$childContent

    $macros.RightSideBar("%{beforeWidget='
  • ', afterWidget='
    • ', beforeTitle='

    ', afterTitle='

    '}")

© $data.Site.Title — Copyblogger theme design by Chris Pearson. Implemented in Graffiti by Scott Watermasysk

$data.Site.Copyright
$!data.Site.WebStatistics

$post.Title

$post.Published.ToString("dddd, MMMM dd yyyy") - $post.Category.Name

$post.Body

$macros.TagList($post.TagList)

#foreach($comment in $comments) #beforeall
#nodata #if($post.EnableNewComments)

There are no comments yet...Kick things off by filling out the form below.

#end #each
#$count $comment.Name on $comment.Published.ToString("M.dd.yyyy") at $comment.Published.ToString("h:mm tt")
$comment.Body #if($isUser)Delete Comment#end
#afterall
#end #if($post.EnableNewComments)

Leave a Comment

Logged in as $user.ProperName Logout

$macros.CommentButton("%{class='form_submit', tabindex='5', value='Submit'}")
